docs.abstract: Brandon Gaudin, 29,  is chosen from among more than 150 applicants to be Georgia Tech’s radio play-by-play announcer; Georgia Tech athletics is affiliated with IMG College, which holds multimedia rights to football programs of 80 universities, making it the largest such network.
